thread.title: 2 mins walk from the excel centre!
thread.title_full: 2 mins walk from the excel centre! - Review of Premier Inn London Docklands (Excel) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: deano_eighties
title: 2 mins walk from the excel centre!
text: Staff were excellent and went out of there way to help. Rooms have a kettle with tea and coffee for guests. You have a hair dryer, towels a fan and a large TV. Food was good with friendly service. Your 3 minutes walk from the excel centre so couldn't be in a more ideal location.
